property.name: CondorPlatform
property.desc: The Condor platform string for the daemon's platform

property.name: CondorVersion
property.desc: The Condor version string for the daemon's version

property.name: DaemonStartTime
property.desc: Number of nanoseconds since epoch when the daemon was started

property.name: AccountingGroup
property.desc: AccountingGroup of the running job, fully qualified with a UidDomain, UidDomain taken from RemoteUser, only present when a job is executing

property.name: Activity
property.desc: One of: Idle, No job activity; Busy, Job is running; Suspended, Job is suspended; Vacating, Job is being removed; Killing, Job is being killed; Benchmarking, Benchmarks being run

property.name: Arch
property.desc: Slot's architecture, e.g.: ALPHA, Diginal Alpha; HPPA1, HP PA-RISC 1.x (7000 series); HPPA2, HP PA-RISC 2.x (8000 series); IA64, Intel Itanium; INTEL, Intel x86 (Pentium, Xeon, etc); SGI, SGI MIPS; SUN4u, Sun UltraSparc; SUN4x, Sun Sparc (not UltraSparc); PPC, Power Macintosh; PPC64, 64-bit Power Macintosh; X86_64, AMD/Intel 64-bit x86

property.name: CheckpointPlatform
property.desc: Opaque string encoding OS, hardware and kernel attributes

property.name: ClientMachine
property.desc: The hostname of the machine that has claimed the slot, only present when slot is claimed

statistic.name: ClockDay
statistic.desc: Day of the week: 0 = Sunday, 1 = Monday, ..., 6 = Saturaday

statistic.name: ClockMin
statistic.desc: Number of elapsed minutes since midnight

property.name: ConcurrencyLimits
property.desc: Set of concurrency limits associated with the current job

statistic.name: CondorLoadAvg
statistic.desc: Portion of LoadAvg generated by Condor (job or benchmark)

statistic.name: ConsoleIdle
statistic.desc: Seconds since activity on console keyboard or mouse

property.name: Cpus
property.desc: Number of CPUs in slot

property.name: CurrentRank
property.desc: Slots' affinity for running the job it is currently hosting, calculated as Rank expression evaluated in context of the running job's ad

property.name: Disk
property.desc: Amount of disk space in KiB available in the slot

property.name: EnteredCurrentActivity
property.desc: Time at which current Activity was entered, number of nanoseconds since Unix epoch

property.name: EnteredCurrentState
property.desc: Time at which current State was entered, number of seconds since Unix epoch

property.name: FileSystemDomain
property.desc: Configured namespace shared by slots with uniformly mounted shared storage

property.name: GlobalJobId
property.desc: The running job's GlobalJobId, only present when a job is executing

statistic.name: ImageSize
statistic.desc: Estimate of the memory image size, in KiB, of the running job, only present when a job is executing, pulled by STARTD_JOB_EXPRS

property.name: IsValidCheckpointPlatform
property.desc: A configurable expression representing if a checkpointed job can run on the slot, part of the slot's Requirements along with the Start expression

property.name: JobId
property.desc: The running job's identifier, i.e. ClusterId.ProcId, only present when a job is executing

property.name: JobStart
property.desc: The number of nanosecond since epoch when the job began executing, only present when a job is executing

statistic.name: KeyboardIdle
statistic.desc: Number of seconds since any activity on any keyboard or mouse associated with the machine, including pseudo-terminals

property.name: KFlops
property.desc: Relative floating point performance on a Linpack benchmark

property.name: LastBenchmark
property.desc: Number of nanoseconds since epoch when the last benchmark was run

property.name: LastFetchWorkCompleted
property.desc: Number of nanoseconds since epoch when the FetchWork Hook returned

property.name: LastFetchWorkSpawned
property.desc: Number of nanoseconds since epoch when the FetchWork Hook was invoked

property.name: LastPeriodicCheckpoint
property.desc: The number of nanoseconds since epoch when the job last performed a periodic checkpoint, only present when a job is executing

statistic.name: LoadAvg
statistic.desc: Load average of CPUs hosting the slot

property.name: Machine
property.desc: The fully qualified hostname of slot's host machine

property.name: MaxJobRetirementTime
property.desc: Expression evaluated in context of job ad producing the number of seconds a job is allowed to finish before being killed, relevant when job is being kicked out of the slot

property.name: Memory
property.desc: Amount of RAM available in the slot, in MiB

property.name: Mips
property.desc: Relative integer performance on a Dhrystone benchmark

property.name: MyAddress
property.desc: IP:Port of StartD in charge of the slot

statistic.name: MyCurrentTime
statistic.desc: The number of nanoseconds since epoch that the slot produced an updated ad

property.name: Name
property.desc: Name of the slot, either the same as Machine, slot#@Machine, or a configured value

property.name: NextFetchWorkDelay
property.desc: Number of seconds until the next FetchWork Hook will be invoked, -1 means never

property.name: OpSys
property.desc: Slot's operating system, e.g.: HPUX10, HPUX 10.20; HPUX11, HPUX B.11.00; LINUX, Linux 2.[0,2,4,6].x kernels; OSF1, Diginal Unix 4.x; OSX, Darwin; OSX10_2, Darwin 6.4; SOLARIS25, Solaris 2.4 or 5.5; SOLARIS251, Solaris 2.5.1 or 5.5.1; SOLARIS26, Solaris 2.6 or 5.6; SOLARIS27, Solaris 2.7 or 5.7; SOLARIS28, Solaris 2.8 or 5.8; SOLARIS29, Solaris 2.9 or 5.9; WINNT50, Windows 2000; WINNT51, Windows XP; WINNT52, Windows Server 2003; WINNT60, Windows Vista

property.name: PreemptingConcurrencyLimits
property.desc: Set of concurrency limits associated with the preempting job

property.name: PreemptingOwner
property.desc: The name of the user originally preempting the current job, i.e. the incoming user, only present when slot is claimed

property.name: PreemptingUser
property.desc: The name of the user preempting the current job, different from PreemptingOwner only if the claim was given to another user who is using it to preempt, only present when slot is claimed

property.name: PreemptingRank
property.desc: Slots' affinity for running the incoming, preempting, job, calculated as Rank expression evaluated in context of the incoming job's ad, only present when slot is claimed

property.name: RemoteOwner
property.desc: The name of the user who originally claimed the slot, only present when slot is claimed

property.name: RemoteUser
property.desc: The name of the user who is currently using the slot, different from RemoteOwner only if the claim was given to another user who is using the slot, only present when slot is claimed

property.name: Requirements
property.desc: Expression evaluated in the context of a job ad to determine if the slot will run a job

property.name: Rank
property.desc: Configured expression representing how the slot prefers jobs

property.name: SlotID
property.desc: The # in the slot's Name, i.e. Name='slot#@Machine'

property.name: Start
property.desc: Expression evaluated to determine if a slot is willing to start running a job

property.name: StarterAbilityList
property.desc: StringList, comma separated, set of abilities the slot has, i.e. HasFileTransfer,HasJava,HasVM, query with stringListMember('Element', StarterAbilityList)

property.name: State
TimeToLive
property.desc: Number of second until StartD managing the slot has until it will exit

property.name: TotalClaimRunTime
property.desc: Number of seconds the current claim has spent running jobs, only present when slot is claimed

property.name: TotalClaimSuspendTime
property.desc: Number of seconds the current claim has spent with suspended jobs, only present when slot is claimed

statistic.name: TotalCondorLoadAvg
statistic.desc: Portion of TotalLoadAvg generated by Condor (jobs or benchmarks)

property.name: TotalCpus
property.desc: Total number of CPUs on slot's host machine, or NUM_CPUS configuration option

property.name: TotalDisk
property.desc: Amount of disk space available on the slot's host machine

property.name: TotalJobRunTime
property.desc: Number of seconds the current job has spent running, i.e. Claimed/Busy, only present when slot is claimed

property.name: TotalJobSuspendTime
property.desc: Number of seconds the current job has spent suspended, i.e. Claimed/Suspended, only present when slot is claimed

statistic.name: TotalLoadAvg
statistic.desc: Total load average of the slot's host machine

property.name: TotalMemory
property.desc: Total RAM available on slot's machine, in MiB

property.name: TotalSlots
property.desc: Total number of slots sharing the Machine

statistic.name: TotalTimeBackfillBusy
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Backfill and Activity=Busy since the Startd started

statistic.name: TotalTimeBackfillIdle
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Backfill and Activity=Idle since the Startd started

statistic.name: TotalTimeBackfillKilling
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Backfill and Activity=Killing since the Startd started

statistic.name: TotalTimeClaimedBusy
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Claimed and Activity=Busy since the Startd started

statistic.name: TotalTimeClaimedIdle
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Claimed and Activity=Idle since the Startd started

statistic.name: TotalTimeClaimedRetiring
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Claimed and Activity=Retiring since the Startd started

statistic.name: TotalTimeClaimedSuspended
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Claimed and Activity=Suspended since the Startd started

statistic.name: TotalTimeMatchedIdle
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Matched and Activity=Idle since the Startd started

statistic.name: TotalTimeOwnerIdle
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Owner and Activity=Idle since the Startd started

statistic.name: TotalTimePreemptingKilling
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Preempting and Activity=Killing since the Startd started

statistic.name: TotalTimePreemptingVacating
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Preempting and Activity=Vacating since the Startd started

statistic.name: TotalTimeUnclaimedBenchmarking
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Unclaimed and Activity=Benchmarking since the Startd started

statistic.name: TotalTimeUnclaimedIdle
statistic.desc: Accumulated number of seconds the slot has been in State=Unclaimed and Activity=Idle since the Startd started

property.name: TotalVirtualMemory
property.desc: Amount of swap space available on slot

property.name: UidDomain
property.desc: Configured namespace shared by slots with uniform uid/gid entries, i.e. same logins and groups

property.name: VirtualMemory
property.desc: Amount of currently available virtual memory (swap space) in KiB

property.name: WindowsBuildNumber
property.desc: Integer extracted from the platform type, representing a build number for a Windows operating system, only present on Windows slots

property.name: WindowsMajorVersion
property.desc: Integer extracted from the platform type, representing a major version number for a Windows operating system, only present on Windows slots, e.g. 5 for OpSys=WINNT50

property.name: WindowsMinorVersion
property.desc: Integer extected from the platform type, representing a minor version numer for a Windows operating system, only present on Windows slots, e.g. 2 for OpSys=WINNT52

property.name: WindowedStatWidth
property.desc: The stat window width, config param WINDOWED_STAT_WIDTH

statistic.name: UpdateInterval
statistic.desc: Seconds between current publish and previous

statistic.name: JobsSubmitted
statistic.desc: Number of jobs submitted over most recent sampling window

statistic.name: JobSubmissionRate
statistic.desc: Rate of job submissions (jobs per second) over most recent sampling window

statistic.name: JobsCompleted
statistic.desc: Number of jobs completed (successfully, shadow code=100 or 115) over most recent sampling window

statistic.name: JobCompletionRate
statistic.desc: Rate of job completions (jobs per second) over most recent sampling window

statistic.name: JobsExited
statistic.desc: Number of jobs that exited over most recent sampling window

statistic.name: ShadowExceptions
statistic.desc: Number of shadow excptions over most recent sampling window

statistic.name: JobsSubmittedCum
statistic.desc: Number of jobs submitted over lifetime of the Scheduler

statistic.name: JobsCompletedCum
statistic.desc: Number of jobs successfully completed over lifetime of the Scheduler

statistic.name: JobsExitedCum
statistic.desc: Number of jobs exited over the lifetime of the Scheduler

statistic.name: ShadowExceptionsCum
statistic.desc: Number of shadow exceptions over the lifetime of the Scheduler

statistic.name: JobsStartedCum
statistic.desc: Number of jobs started over the lifetime of the Scheduler

statistic.name: JobsStarted
statistic.desc: Number of jobs started over the lifetime of the Scheduler

statistic.name: JobStartRate
statistic.desc: Rate of job starts (jobs per second) over the most recent sampling window

statistic.name: MeanTimeToStartCum
statistic.desc: Mean time a job waits in the Scheduler until first start, over the lifetime of the Scheduler

statistic.name: MeanRunningTimeCum
statistic.desc: Mean running time (wall-clock) for jobs in the Scheduler, over the lifetime of the Scheduler

statistic.name: SumTimeToStartCum
statistic.desc: Sum of job wait times to first start, over the lifetime of the Scheduler

statistic.name: SumRunningTimeCum
statistic.desc: Sum of job running times, over the lifetime of the Scheduler

statistic.name: MeanTimeToStart
statistic.desc: Mean time a job waits in the Scheduler until first start, over most recent sampling window

statistic.name: MeanRunningTime
statistic.desc: Mean running time (wall-clock) time of jobs in the Scheduler, over most recent sampling window

property.name: Owner
property.desc: Match for same Submission field

statistic.name: MatchRate
statistic.desc: Matches per second over current cycle

statistic.name: MatchRateSustained
statistic.desc: Matches per second, since end of previous cycle

statistic.name: Matches
statistic.desc: Number of matches generated

statistic.name: Duration
statistic.desc: Negotiation cycle duration

statistic.name: Phase1Duration
statistic.desc: Duration of phase 1

statistic.name: Phase2Duration
statistic.desc: Duration of phase 2

statistic.name: Phase3Duration
statistic.desc: Duration of phase 3

statistic.name: Phase4Duration
statistic.desc: Duration of phase 4

statistic.name: SlotShareIter
statistic.desc: Number of share iterations

statistic.name: NumSchedulers
statistic.desc: Number of submitters

statistic.name: ActiveSubmitterCount
statistic.desc: Number of submitters with jobs

statistic.name: SubmittersFailed
statistic.desc: List of submitters that encountered a failure

statistic.name: SubmittersOutOfTime
statistic.desc: List of submitters that hit their match time limit

statistic.name: SubmittersShareLimit
statistic.desc: List of submitters that hit their share limit

statistic.name: NumIdleJobs
statistic.desc: Number of idle jobs

statistic.name: NumJobsConsidered
statistic.desc: Number of jobs that were considered for matching

statistic.name: Rejections
statistic.desc: Number of rejections

statistic.name: TotalSlots
statistic.desc: Number of slots found

statistic.name: CandidateSlots
statistic.desc: Number of slots considered

statistic.name: TrimmedSlots
statistic.desc: Number of slots after trimming claimed slots

statistic.name: Time
statistic.desc: Start of cycle, since Epoch

statistic.name: End
statistic.desc: End of cycle, since Epoch

statistic.name: Period
statistic.desc: Time from end of previous cycle to end of current cycle

arg.name: Subsystem
arg.desc: The component/subsystem to start: one of STARTD, SCHEDD, COLLECTOR, NEGOTIATOR, KBDD or QUILL

arg.name: Subsystem
arg.desc: The component/subsystem to stop: one of STARTD, SCHEDD, COLLECTOR, NEGOTIATOR, KBDD or QUILL

property.name: JobLimit
property.desc: Maximum number of jobs that can be in the process of being submitted at any time.

property.name: SubmitLimit
property.desc: Limit on the number of jobs that will be submitted to the grid resource at once.

property.name: GridResourceUnavailableTime
property.desc: If present, the Grid is down for the specified amount of time.

arg.name: JobAd
arg.desc: (name,value,type) tuples; Values are INTEGER, FLOAT, STRING and EXPR. The EXPR value is not first class, it is an unquoted, with double quotes, string

property.name: QDate
property.desc: Oldest QDate of member jobs
